title: Patcher & Landing Page Visual Refresh to PBE

replies.body: Looks great rito! It's nice to know that you guys are listening to our suggestions :)
Vote up for the death of teemo
{{champion:17}} You can't kill Death.
Teemo isn't satan. Satan is Teemo's apprentice.

When other people see {{champion:17}} they be like awwwwww he so cute 
When we see {{champion:17}}  we be like {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:3117}}  GTFOOOOOOOOO
Yes, Satan is Teemo incarnate.
@ahadcm: You got it all wrong, my friend...the peeps at Riot did not create Teemo, they SUMMONED it. Those reckless fools!
Then who is Riot since they created Teemo?
Report {{champion:17}} for pasive abuse
{{champion:17}} doesn't die. He just returns to hell for a short trip.{{summoner:10}}
{{champion:45}} Is that a short joke?

Thank you. This is the first step of a long process, and we definitely want your continued thoughts and feedback.  Looking forward to you all letting us know what does (and doesn’t!) work.  We’ve seen a few threads of your ideas on how to redesign the pre-game experience, and are constantly impressed by everyone’s creativity and passion. :)
So Logout button? o_o' There's plenty of space to place one next to the options button, or in fact just put it IN the options.
You'll just see visual updates right now within the client.  We are mapping out future plans, and feedback like this is helpful!
What about a way to check the ping before we actually play lol?
@Not Rising; A ping checker is a brilliant idea.  You Sir/Ma'am are going places.

would it be difficult to have chat in load screen? would be nice to plan things out and get to know team better while ur all just sitting there anyways only bad thing is if someone IMMEDIATELY starts to troll in champ select and u end up arguing while in load screen so mute option there would be helpful so u will still lose cuz of them but atleast u already have them muted XD
im with this guy. i have family members that play, and transferring from one account to the next is a pain in- well, you know
will the new patcher and client be twice as big or the same size because twice as big would call for some really big changes {{summoner:10}}
The patcher definitely got bigger - same dimensions as the client, which'll be staying at its current size. Just prettier :D
but will it be powered by adobe air..

No it won't.  The patcher update that we are releasing to PBE includes a lot of the core tech needed for a new client.  The patcher update won’t use Adobe AIR, it is built on our own native code base and HTML5 UI.

THANK YOU. I wanted to hear Adobe Air disappear someday :')

These are real tears btw. Thank you. :')
(Emphasis on 'someday' for now - we've got a long road ahead of us to get there!)

ROUND OF APPLAUSE FOR RITO!

clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap clap
Sir your round of applause is quite square.
Someday is better than never! Take steps, breathe, just get there "someday" XD
Btw, does this mean future native Linux compatibility with your client? o.o I mean you COULD. Just curious if you are considering it. I miss using Ubuntu!

Free game on free OS, doesn't this just sound perfect?
I'm sure to try it out day one!
We NEED options in the client, like in game keybindings, graphics settings, in client sound for pregame and the like.

I completely forgot about this! Yes, pre-game keybindings, graphic settings, etc for in-game options are a must. I don't know how many times I have been forced to just go into a custom game to do this -.-'
Still no logout button -_-{{summoner:11}}
rito doesn't want us to log out {{champion:48}}
insert Sword Art Online panic scene
SEASON 2 HYPE?!?
If it's anything like the Alfheim arc, absolutely not.
Thats what the X is for
Thats not Logout, thats "Close Client and reboot it button"

Still serves the same purpose. The logout button would do the same thing as the X. It would still ask if you're sure you want to leave the client, do it's little server communication thingee and then close.
But if you logout, why would you log back in instantly? Doesn't logging out mean that you're done playing for the time being?
Lets say hypothetically there are 2 people who use 1 computer. Mind=blown
The point of a log out button is so that the client wouldn't close entirely, just bring you to the log in screen. Rather than closing and opening it again.
Can you make the cross blade of the influence points glow when first win of the day bonus is available?
Noob here. What does PBE mean?

Public Beta Environment.

Think of it as a server where "possible" patches are released weeks in advance for bug and balance testing.
Public Beta Environment. Got to pbe.leagueoflegends.com to apply. You can basically test new stuff before it comes out, like new champs, skins, and the SR Visual Update.
{{item:3166}} =league aesthetics 1 year ago. {{item:3418}} = league aesthetics now.{{item:3415}} = league aesthetics one year from now.
{{champion:107}} {{item:3410}} Change is good..
What about the spectating live games? I enjoy watching those from time to time
